mapper.select: SELECT studentId_n AS studentId, number_x AS number, name_m AS name, professionId_n AS professionId, classId_n AS clazzId, from_x AS from, age_n AS age, sex_n AS sex, birth_dt AS birthDate, active_c AS active, create_dt AS createDate, create_m AS createBy, update_dt AS updateDate, update_m AS updateBy FROM ems_student WHERE active_c = 'A' AND classId_n = #{clazzId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: UPDATE ems_student s LEFT JOIN ems_profession p ON s.professionId_n = p.professionId_n SET s.active_c = 'F' WHERE p.facultyId_n = #{facultyId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND s.active_c = 'A'

UPDATE ems_user u LEFT JOIN ems_student s ON u.username_m = s.number_x LEFT JOIN ems_profession p ON s.professionId_n = p.professionId_n SET u.enabled_c = 'N' WHERE p.facultyId_n = #{facultyId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND s.active_c = 'A'
UPDATE ems_user u LEFT JOIN ems_student s ON u.username_m = s.number_x SET u.enabled_c = 'N' WHERE s.professionId_n = #{professionId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND s.active_c = 'A'
UPDATE ems_student SET active_c = 'P' WHERE professionId_n = #{professionId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND (active_c = 'A' OR active_c = 'F')
UPDATE ems_user u LEFT JOIN ems_student s ON u.username_m = s.number_x SET u.enabled_c = 'Y' WHERE s.professionId_n = #{professionId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND s.active_c = 'F'
UPDATE ems_student s LEFT JOIN ems_profession p ON s.professionId_n = p.professionId_n SET s.active_c = 'A' WHERE p.facultyId_n = #{facultyId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND s.active_c = 'F'
